parameters.name: applicationName
parameters.description: The name of an CodeDeploy application associated with the user or Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the application was created.

nested_items.name: linkedToGitHub
nested_items.description: True if the user has authenticated with GitHub for the specified application. Otherwise, false.

nested_items.name: gitHubAccountName
nested_items.description: The name for a connection to a GitHub account.

nested_items.name: computePlatform
nested_items.description: The destination platform type for deployment of the application ( Lambda or Server).
